mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post_board (userId, title, content, category, postType, createTime, shippingFee, includes, imagePath) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{category}, #{postType}, NOW(), #{shippingFee}, #{includes}, #{imagePath})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM post_board ORDER BY createTime DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE post_board SET views = views + 1 WHERE boardId = #{boardId}
